section.heading: Certification.
section.text: Each part of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations, each permanent supplement of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations, and the District of Columbia Register shall contain a certificate by the Administrator stating that such part contains all documents required to be published pursuant to this subchapter as of the date of such certificate.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 6, 1979, D.C. Law 2-153, § 4, 25 DCR 6960

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-168 deleted “the District of Columbia Statutes-at-Large” following “Each part of.”
